title: Japan: Nagano Northern Alps Forest Retreat with Outdoor Onsen
description: Boasting spectacular Japanese Northern Alps vistas, ANA Holiday Inn Resort Shinano-omachi Kuroyon, an IHG Hotel, is a forest-framed retreat perfect for escaping the everyday. Soak to your heart's content at the outdoor onsen or head out to experience the alpine route's hikes and snowy slopes. Sample a sweet sake by the fireplace at the log-cabin-inspired lobby bar before dining on locally-sourced Japanese fare with international flair at Botanica restaurant.
